summary:
## Master of Science Degree

A Master of Science (M.S.) degree is an advanced college degree. It shows you've become an expert in a specific subject. To get one, you usually need to have already finished a bachelor's degree.  After earning an M.S., people are expected to know a lot about their field, be able to solve hard problems, and think creatively. It's a sign you've taken your education to a higher level.
title: Master's degree
